...Hmph. I don't care about a man like that anymore. Anymore... I said not anymore! Argh! I really want to give him a beating, regardless of love or not! I want to punch that playboy face of his!

The most beautiful man in the Round Table? Oh, you mean Tris? So he was the number one within the Round Table? I see... Well, there's nothing bad about him as long as he keeps his mouth shut, and his voice isn't half bad... I guess that's valid.

I'm the Alter Ego of pleasure, Meltryllis.
I'd really rather not, but I suppose I'll form a contract with you. You should be honored, okay?
Like this?
Let's enjoy this.
Hehe. So delicious.

Happy birthday.
Let's enjoy a leisurely, languid, loving day together.

Hm. Is that a battle I hear?
They say the world cannot be rid of conflict, but grating on one's ears is unforgiveable.
Let us punish them, Master.

They say that too much rest can be its own poison.
Why not try moving about, Master?

You wish to know my purpose?
As I have taken the vow to serve as a Servant, I shall lead you to enlightenment with all of my being.

No matter what the past between us holds, as we have formed a contract, our relationship as Master and Servant is true.
...Yes, until the very end, allow me to satiate myself to the fullest...

What I like...?
Why, humans, of course.
Oh, and I like sweet rice balls coated with sweet red beans!
And...nursery tales. But I am a woman now, so I may not enjoy such things forever.

What I hate. Ah, there is one thing.
Pessimistic, foul-mouthed and narrow-minded sorts. Men whose every action is thorny, prickly, and truculent. I simply cannot stand those types.

Holy Grail? Is it like the skull rituals?
The claim that it can grant any wish makes it seem a sham. I believe it is a thing far from benevolent...
Sessyoin Kiara. I heard your call, and I have come. Please, allow yourself to drown, to indulge in the pleasures of my body all you like.

I am a Servant now, but I am also a clergywoman who listens to the doubts and pains of others and heals their minds and spirits. So, please, confess your troubles to me. Unburden yourself. I shall embrace you with my entire being.

(Sigh) ...I am bored.
I've never met a more naive and restrained person than you... Unless... Do you truly believe that I am indeed a good person...?
If that is so... Whatever shall I do?
Indeed I said I would do anything you want me to do. But, do I really have to change my ways?

Yes, what is it, Master?
Please, rest assured that I have not taken in any new believers, just as you ordered.
Hehe. I am starting to understand how to interact with you.
When in a clear stream, follow its pure and simple path...and enjoy it...
I dare not defile it.
Mmmm... Not yet.

To try to save the world as one whose talents are so ordinary, and with such a feeble soul... What an impossible feat. I thought you would have given up already.
You have turned out to be an extraordinarily noble being, strengthened by many intersecting lives and bonds.
Yes. I see that now, and I shall step up to the cause as well.
Dragging such a noble being to the depths would be the ultimate celestial pleasure. Let us race to see who will give up first.
I so desperately wish for you to overcome all of my wickedness, Master.

Oh. So that boy is named Andersen?
I do not know. I do not know of that person at all.
Melons, cow-woman, a whore who crawled out of a sewer... No, I do not remember those words at all!
As such, please do not invite him into the same room, or especially the same party as me. Do you understand?
...For mercy's sake.

Ah. So he also turned into a Servant as well.
White hair, a twisted mind, dual-wielding guns...
Hehe...what ill fate.
The great hero of justice who drenched his own hands in blood, destroying my many followers... All to defeat my own evil.
Hehe...how amusing. A fall from grace, and all that remains is the decay. Am I right?

Ah...I never expected the Beast that has paired with me is Kama instead of Mara...
There's no denying that she's younger than me, but isn't she a bit...too graceless?

Oh. To think that the lord of Demon God Pillars is at Chaldea. Do you have no dignity as the one who was vanquished?
Well, I suppose I have no room to talk.
We should both be wary of a knife in the back.

You wish to know my purpose?
As I have taken the vow to serve as a Servant, I shall lead you to enlightenment with all of my being.
Ah, but...
The thought of your feverish desire for salvation through this body... Exquisite...
I want to melt with you...

Ah Master, you have come for a visit?
It appears that these sets of battles are quite arduous.
I hope these items will be of help to you.

Teehee. Item exchanges are nice. Collecting things that are both lacking and excessive and then combining them to create some sort of unique result...
Even during my childhood, I played shell matching games. Well, I played those games because there really was nothing but reading as far as entertainment went.

Ah, Master is so absorbed in offering so many precious things to me...
While I know this is all intended to help resolve this Singularity, I may still lose myself...

My, you have collected so much!
Please take this.
An unobtainable life gained justly through ceaseless efforts.
I enjoy witnessing these things so very much... Teehee...

This is just one measure of salvation.
Normally I do not require anything of value... But people never cease to offer me gifts for some reason...

Good work on exorcising the vulgar Beast that was rampaging around the realm.
I was holding my breath watching the entire thing unfold...
Ah...even though she was our enemy, I was a bit jealous seeing her treated so roughly...
I may consider going off the rails again one of these days...

Oh my. The incident has been resolved, and you have offered everything...yet you still have business with me?
Teehee... Could it be that the flame of passion within your soul is not completely satiated? 
Choosing quantity over quality when it comes to indulging oneself in women's hell is so childish.
Yet I take it that you would like to drown yourself in the sweet hell of women that engulfs all... Am I correct?
May you enjoy all the weight of passionate madness you can stand, and a little more...

Alter Ego, Sessyoin Kiara.
I have come to answer the voices calling for salvation.
But...hehe...
I wonder about the sort of person who would summon a woman like me.
I am the Devilish Bodhisattva who savors all living creatures, sentient or not.
You have no choice now but to stay with me until the very end.
You will submit to me!
Enemy sighted.
You cannot escape!
Eli-chan Drill!

Now then, let us head out.
I will be watching over you.
Despite being a shadow, I am also in service to another...kuku... The irony is not lost on me.
I advise you use me to the bone to benefit humanity. Do not hold back, Master.

What I like...

What I dislike.

The Holy Grail. Are you asking how I feel about it?
Fufu. Fufufufufufufu.
No, no, no. Nothing in particular from me...mfufufufufufu...

Come, Master. Together let's take back humanity, the world, and Proper Human History!
Fufufu!

Master. You mustn't overwork yourself, as there is no replacement for you. And while that may be more reason for you to try even harder, you still mustn't.
Ah, just leave all administrative work to me. As I have intimate knowledge of court proceedings. I have observed and learned to perform administrative tasks at superhuman speed. Now then, leave it to me! Leave it all to me.

Master, I am always saying things like "nnn...hm" at the end of my sentences, but actually, I just suddenly forget what I'm thinking. Nnn, I'm terribly sorry!
What's that? You say that everyone has lapses in memory sometimes? Oh-ho! You too!?
Fufu. Even if I am in the guise of a Heroic Spirit, I am still the shadow monk of humanity. But I suppose that's no different than what it means to be human.

Master...my lord.
Mm, mmm... While I thought I understood it wholeheartedly, how on earth can I convey this feeling of my heart pounding in my breast? Master. Every time I look into your eyes or when I see the side of your face, I...I...I am overtaken with this overwhelming sense of emotion that I cannot control! I try telling myself that it must be pacified...
No, please worry not. I am just losing my mind...

My lord, your orders, please.
I will not hesitate to take action for you. Whether it be slaughtering or violating others...
Anything that you will hesitate in doing, I will not. I will not hesitate to perform every kind of evil to pave the way for you.

Tamamo-no-Mae...
Your beauty persists in the past, present, and even the future, without caring about others' business. You are always beautiful. So much so that it is repulsive.
Minamoto-no-Raikou... To think that even after becoming a shadow, you have not faded...

Fufu. Fufufu. Did you just say no more deception? Fufu. Fufufufu...mmmMMM! Very true! Everything about me was utter nonsense!
I am me. I possess the memories of both Alter Ego Ashiya Douman, Caster...as well as Limbo.
In that time, I appreciated you tolerating the many games I played.
...Pardon?
Oh, no, no, no! Do not worry, this Spirit Origin of mine has severed its former ties, and I am just one of your Servants summoned by Chaldea's summoning system. I am no longer associated with that Foreign God. And if you do not believe me, I am perfectly willing to chop off my head as proof. Kuku...but if it is possible, since I was summoned, I would like to accompany you to the very ends of hell, my lord.

Ah, Raikou's Four Heavenly Kings.
Did you know? Even proud warriors have ceased to exist in this age!
Mmm! What a shame!

Wise individuals from the other lands!
Surely you must be practitioners of sage and Taoist techniques. Very intriguing. I will have you know that I also... Mmm, ahem. Maybe some other time.

Katou Danzo.
Do you have business...with me? I can't help but be rooted to the ground when you leer at me like that. Kukuku...

Fuuma Kotaro.
The leader of the Fuuma ninja clan. I see, so he is...
Does he want something from me? Surveillance?
Hm, I do not know why he would need to do something like that for me, but he may do as he pleases.

I see.
That woman has fulfilled her true wishes and reached her end...

My, my...Lady Fujiwara-no-Kaoruko. Or perhaps you'd prefer I address you as Lady Murasaki.
By the way, Lady Kaoruko, has Seimei said...anything to you?
Nothing? Nothing at all?
Mmmmm I see, I see.
Lady Sei Shounagon, I beg you to stop. Please do not attempt to disrobe me. I am not a beast disguised as a human! I am merely a "Beautiful Carnivore"... I said STOP!

What? You want to play with me?
Very well! Let me first create a life-sized shikigami. You may then dismantle it all you like...
Mmm? Why are you pulling my hair, Nursery Rhyme? Playing dangerous games is forbidden in Chaldea? It's time to play house?
...Very well.
Then I request to play the role of the mother-in-law!

My Spirit Origin has changed!
I do have to say this outfit really puts me in my element. Why, when I was living in the capital during the Heian period, I wore this Buddhist outfit.
There were times when I saved humans.
There were times when I harmed humans.
Now then...which will it be this time?

What I like.
If I must choose, that would be trampling upon others' pride, beliefs...those kinds of things. Very nice. It's very nice. Such sweet pleasures. Don't you agree?

Very nice to meet you!
I am a monk, as well as an onmyou priest, with the True Name of Ashiya Douman.
And my class! It's Alter Ego!
Huh... An Alter Ego. Not a Caster?
Peculiar things do happen, don't they? Either way, I look forward to you taking good care of me, Master.

Why did I join the force, you ask? Because the Servant Universe began its new season. Since I'm grown up now, I found a job with the Galactic Police and use my powers to protect space!

Hmmm, delicious!

Fufufu...just because I'm a cop doesn't mean I should be bound by the law. After all, there are some evildoers who can't be defeated by legal means alone.

I meant to be an adult who would save Master, but instead I was the one who ended up getting saved...

So today is your birthday.
This is truly a wonderful day.
Let's take the opportunity to prepare for a drink and banquet...
No, I'm just kidding.
What do you say we go out on a long horse ride together? We'll go woosh! Dash! Neigh!
Ahahahaha!

Is there a battle? Then it'll be my time to shine.
Eh? It might be a festival?
Ahaha! That's still my time to shine!
Let's chug a drink for starters, then!

What are you waiting for?
Being holed up in the castle is no fun... I mean, it's not a recommended strategy.
Life's all about taking bold steps, and battle calls for prompt decisions. Just bear in mind that taking action is pivotal!
Now let's head out!

Master and Servant relationship?
I've never served under anyone before, so fighting under your command is really new to me.
Plus, I don't have to do any of the annoying things, like managing territory.
Here, there's no fear of Usamin chewing me out, so everything's a cakewalk! Ahaha!

Now that I think about it, you sure are an audacious one, who must not even fear the heavens, as you're utilizing me, Nagao Kagetora, as a Servant.
Ahahahahaha!
I'm just kidding. Let it go.

What I like?
Well, that's got to be sake. Alcohol.
The sake from Echigo is the best in the nation.
And some salt or umeboshi would make it even more splendid!
...Actually, I've been hearing of this Western alcohol served at the cafeteria called a "draft?" I would love to try a cup of this draft.

What I dislike?
Well, I'm not too keen on taking a fortress through starvation...
I understand the strategy to fight over rice and salt, but if we're to fight, I'd rather just straight up kill or be killed.
But in cases like that, it might be good to lend your enemies a helping hand by sending them some salt.

A Holy Grail that can grant any wish?
I see, I see.
Hmmm, I'm not so sure about getting one's desires granted that way...
Don't you think desires should be earned or won through your own efforts?
Anyway, it looks like a good cup for a night of drinking.
No, that would be bad form, even for me.

Eh? Why am I a Lancer instead of a Rider? That's up to the Holy Grail, so I can't say much.
I don't have any particular attachment to lances, horses, or swords, so no matter which I specialize in, I'll still win.

Guns? Those are no good, since they miss.
Try shooting at me. I'll just be eating lunch while that's happening.
Huh? Am I actually bad at using projectiles, you ask?
...How did you figure that out?

That horse is named Houshou Tsukige. It's a wonderful horse.
It has a bit of a short fuse, but it's reliable in battle.
Eh? Then why am I not a Rider, you ask?
Honestly, I can't really say I haven't asked that same question.

Hmm, I wasn't sure how it would go, wielding my spear under another's command. But being under your command is very comforting to me.
Ahahaha! I never imagined someone in this world would make me think this way, despite my inhuman disposition.
...So even that is possible.

I am Nagao Kagetora, the avatar of the Touhachi Bishamonten and Echigo's god of war! From now on, I will lend you my strength, my power...my everything!
Eh? You heard that already?
Don't worry about it. This is just how I make my declarations.
At any rate, I'm in a glorious and crystal clear mood...like a sunny day without a cloud in the sky! Ahahahaha!

Oda Nobunaga from Owari...
I did receive numerous letters full of flattery, but I found them all suspicious.
Yet, I have to say that the strategies employed at Okehazama and Nagashino were impressive.
Either way, I have no intention of losing should we fight. Absolutely not.

Demon King Nobunaga...
Someone like you is truly the definition of a destroyer who fears neither gods nor Buddhas.
Do not worry. No matter how powerful you become, I can always kill you.

Ah, the brat from the Mori clan's here too.
...What is with that face?
Want me to hurt you again?

When it comes to military tactics, Lord Yoshitsune comes to mind!
Eh? Lord Yoshitsune's here? Right here?
What luck! Would you show me your famous downhill attack at Hiyodorigoe?
If anything, I would love to join you.

Chacha, huh?
I hear that her husband, Lord Hashiba, managed to unify Japan after my, Harunobu, and even Nobunaga's death.
I never met the man, but he must have been a highly virtuous general if he was able to make peace in that age of war.
Eh? He was a womanizer and far from virtuous?
Huh...and in his final years, his recklessness caused a great mess that created a lot of suffering? Th-that is...troubling...

Why do I carry around so many weapons?
Trying to figure out what I should bring when I head out is such a pain... I mean, it's so I have the best equipment for any situation...
Eh? So I should just throw around a bunch of weapons like that golden king?
Well, I'm not so keen on that since projectiles can miss.
It's just not the same if you don't hold the weapon in your hands when you hit things. You know, crack, bang, boom.

So the one on that white horse is Altria...
She certainly has a captivating warrior's stance. And that white horse looks to be on par with my Houshou Tsukige.
She must be a formidable Rider...eh? Lancer?
...Should we go up and protest at the Throne of Heroes together?

So that is the King of Conquerors, Iskandar. The warhorse he's mounted on also has a splendid coat. He's sure to be a powerful Rider...I mean, Lancer.
Yep. Now I understand that people aren't necessarily Riders just because they have mounts...
Eh? He's a Rider?
...It just doesn't make any sense.

I see Okita Souji over there.
The valor she displayed on the battlefield back then was truly impressive.
The way her sword cuts people down without hesitation and her apparent fathomless prowess... I now understand why I'm considered to be her mirror image.

Why, if it isn't Ms. Majin.
Your recent aid of a certain individual was something that will leave me, Kagetora, in your debt for the rest of my life.
Oh, Heroic Spirits are already dead, so saying the rest of my life would be strange, huh?
Well, let's say I owe you for the rest of this current life, then.
Eh? Forget about debt and just give you oden?
Then let's raise a cup together tonight.
Eh? You don't drink?
Then I'll take your share.

Welcome. Here, I'll be handling all the trading goods for the Chaldea clan.
This is the place to procure resources and products you might need.
After all, the most important thing in battle is securing supplies.
Eh? Why am I here, you ask?
They were apparently shorthanded, so I had no choice...

(Sigh) I'm bored.
Honestly, I don't think I'm suited for this job. I'm the god of war, after all.
Oh, you want me to procure supplies?
Bring them all over.

Go ahead and take that item.
Ummm, so there's one less of that, and there's three more of that... Where's my book?
Argh! Enough!
Why would the avatar of Bishamonten need to do a job like this!?

Phew...there's nothing like sake from Echigo. And this salt I borrowed from the kitchen...the combination of these two sure is the best...
AH!? When did you show up!?
Eh? I-I was just inspecting the wares! THAT'S ALL!

Hm! You certainly have good taste if you were keeping an eye on that item.
That is one of the treasured items from my Bishamonten-Do...
Eh? What's Bishamonten-Do, you ask?
It's what I named the shop.
Pretty good, don't you think? Bishamonten-Do.

It looks like it's almost time to close up the castle storehouse.
I just put all those responsibilities on my retainers back in the day, so doing something like this now has been quite an experience for me.
Obviously I wouldn't want to do it multiple times though. I'm the god of war, after all.
Don't miss your chance to get what you need.

Thinking back, it was both a long and brief experience...like a dream.
Even lifelong prosperity is but one cup of sake...
I will never forget the days I spent fighting alongside you.

I am Nagao Kagetora, the avatar of the Touhachi Bishamonten! 
O weak, yet strong one...the great deeds you are undertaking are absolutely worthy of my devotion and obedience. 
Let me formally say: I'll be in your great care.

Let's see...it'd be weird to be called O-Tora, 
so I'll just call myself the Lancer of the Eight Flourishes for now. 
After all, I'm pretty confident in battle. 
Well then, I hope you take good care of me for the time being!

I am Gareth, the child of King Lot and Morgan.
I once served under King Arthur, and I earned a station as the seventh seat of the Round Table.
Oh, obviously I'm not the first to hold the seventh seat.
Members of the Knights of the Round Table weren't always the same, you know.

So...I guess I was the final knight who joined the Round Table.
Because of my inexperience, the other knights, and especially His Highness and Sir Lancelot, all took me in under their wings.
Oh, did I ever tell you?
I was something of an attendant to Sir Lancelot in the past.

"One day you will become the most capable knight." "You will be a true knight on par with the rest of the brothers."
Everyone around me gave me words of encouragement like that...more than I deserved.
Huh? Pressure?
O-of course there was pressure! But there absolutely wasn't pressure!

I was upset when big brother Agravain decided to expose Sir Lancelot.
It was just so sad.
I of course opposed it.
Because it was Sir Lancelot who officially conferred to me the title of knight.
He was the ideal knight I had always strived to become…

That's right. The past me was killed by Sir Lancelot.
I don't remember what exactly happened that day...
What I saw was Sir Lancelot rushing towards me as he rescued Lady Guinevere, and then he...
...No, this is all just regret on my end.
No matter what I say now, I cannot stop what happened on that day, and no words can console me, and it doesn't change the fact that his hands crushed my head.
I probably was not even in his field of vision and I was the least of his worries. Yes, I know.
That's why I'm not going to mourn the past at this point!
But since I was summoned here wielding a lance, the only thing I can do now is give my all, just like in the past! I'm going to do my best!

Our King of Knights! Ahhh, Your Highness, Arthur!

Ohhh... (Sniff, sniff) Ohhh...

I know it's your birthday. You did good over the past year.
This isn't to show my appreciation for all your efforts, but you should cut loose at least for today.
Come on, tell me your wish. I'll take you to whichever port, anywhere around the world you want.
There's an event going on. Take it easy.

It's time to cruise, Master.
Let's put out to sea.

As long as your commands are reasonable and morally just, then I'll obey you.
I will not carry out any inhumane operations.
Reckless operations...well, I guess it'll depend on the time and place.
I'm a man of few words, so I only say what's necessary. It's not that I don't like you, Master, so don't get the wrong idea about that.

What I like?
The liberating sea, the shape of a spiral shell, playing music, and building secret bases.
As for dessert, I love pudding.

I dislike invasions, bullies, smugglers, and mice.
As for Caenis...it's not like I dislike them. It's more like I'm not really keen on them.

Even if I had the Holy Grail, I wouldn't use it. It turns everything into gold, right?
I'm no King Midas... Imagine how gaudy a golden Nautilus would look like.
A simpleminded treasure like that would be better off with someone like Jason.

How did I end up as your Servant when it was Sion who first summoned me? Fate really is strange.
No, maybe it's better to think that there was an issue with Sion's summoning methods.

I won't have any complaints as long as you follow the ship's rules. I'm saying this not just because I'm the captain, but because I'm also Triton, a god who cherishes freedom.
...I hope you haven't forgotten that part.

Thanks to Sion teaching me memory partition, I was able to Marine is a part of me who likes to do chores, while Professor is a part of me who wants to be engrossed in hobbies. We may all have different personalities, but we're all the same Nemo. It's probably in your best interests to get along with all of us.

Men can have feminine tastes, and women can have masculine tastes. That applies to the Nemo Series too, and that's why there are male and female types.
I'm not going to tell you who's what. But I'm sure you can figure it out.

When we stop at the next port, I want you to come with me to the market. There's only so much I can carry by myself, and it's about time you helped out around the Nautilus.
...Honestly. You wouldn't have helped unless I spelled it out for you. You ARE aware that you are my Master?

A ship's captain has to provide stability. Only being competent in crucial moments is more for adventurers than voyagers of the sea. 
...But then again that's probably why that guy's so appealing to the Marines.

Bartholomew's prudence makes him really reliable.
He's good-looking, considerate, and has good taste when it comes to naming vessels.
So...why is he such a disappointment?

Whoa, Caenis is here!?
No, no, no! We don't like them! They're crude, they're loud, and they don't clean up after themselves!
I know! I'll just swap that spear with a mop next time!

Huh, so that's Orion. The rumors were true: he's super beefy.
...Damn.
That's the dream. If only I had a male body...

I'm both proud and ashamed whenever I see her.
She is proof of my crime and the figure I denounced... Oh, she tripped.
Oh no. She spilled the tea she was carrying on her head. And now all the trash cans are falling on her like dominoes.
Yeah, I really can't take my eyes off her...for so many reasons.

I'm learning so much from Da Vinci.
The Shadow Border and the Nautilus. Now that our team has covered both land and sea, our next goal will be to take to the skies.
...But I'm a little concerned about that.

I hear there's a Servant who claims to be named after the devil of the sea.
They have some nerve, saying that in front of me... Whoa, WHAT!? They're launching a penguin like a torpedo!
Damn...I never thought of doing something like that!

Master, did you know that the deep sea is even less charted than outer space? If you know that, then I can get straight to my point. As an expert of the sea, the one piece of advice I can give you is this:
Never serve octopus as a meal.

...I don't know what it is, but I felt a shiver down my spine.
I feel like I'm a giant tuna laid out for auction, or a sardine on a platter...
Huh? She's a nun who turned immortal after eating a mermaid!?
...Okay, we're bailing!

So Van Gogh's here, too?
I'm relieved since both she and I have ambiguous presences.
I do hope you can be her anchor so she doesn't turn to foam and disappear.

What I like?
I like the feeling of a chilled surface, how a manta ray swims, and vacuum tubes.
But I especially like to be doted on.
...Promise you won't forget to do it sometimes, okay?

What I don't like? Nothing in particular.
Oh, but that jerk Captain pisses me off.
Why? Because whenever they go out to port, they sneak out and eat a bunch of sweets without us!
And here I am, licking salt rocks while I toil alone, caring for the engines. Don't you think that's totally unfair!?

What? Captain's just trying to act cool by saying he doesn't want a Holy Grail.
I think a Holy Grail is wonderful. It dispenses infinite flour, right?
I'll bake a ton of delicious bread for you!

Ooh, ooh!
I like cleaning the instrumentation, cleaning the baths, and carrying torpedoes!
Oh, and I live for lunchtime!

What I dislike? I do not like those who won't take their medicine. Oh, and people who stay up late.
I do hope you don't do those kinds of things, Master.

Very well. We're under special circumstances, so I'll approve the exchange of goods and supplies.
So. Are there anything useful?
The ship is still on high alert. Make sure your Servants are enhanced and ready for battle.

This one? Here you go.
The ship's always low on supplies, so it would be helpful if you kept on exchanging.

...It probably would have been good if I procured more popular materials...
Hm. No, never mind. I was just jotting down things in my journal.

You did good. Our operations ended in victory thanks to your efforts.
...And that's the end of me being all serious.
So many things happened, but we gained so much from this voyage. As captain, I am proud, Master.

This exchange shop will close once the Nautilus docks.
Make sure you finish your exchanges so you don't have any leftover materials.
Then again, I don't think you would want to hold on to anything you acquired in Void Space in the first place, right?

I really don't see the point in reintroducing myself at this moment, but...
I am the son of the sea god Poseidon and Amphitrite. I am a "nobody" who sails across world in the submarine Nautilus.
It might be a bit complicated, but just call me Captain Nemo. Take good care of me, Master.

Ah, so today is the day of your birth.
This calls for a banquet.
...But I must warn you about one thing:
Be careful of banquets.
You can have fun and act jovial, but you must always maintain your composure, no matter what happens at the banquet.
Got that?
...GOT THAT?

There's some sort of commotion out there.
Is something the matter?
I don't mind. I'll accompany you.

Come on, let's go.
Want to walk?
Or do you want to fly to conquer the sky?

I am your Servant, Master.
You can treat me like a subordinate or a comrade...anything you want.
Lack of sleep is the enemy of adventure, Master.

...I love you, Penelope.
But you are not here...

What I dislike?
Great wars between nations. I never want to see such a thing again.

A Holy Grail.
If it really is a wish-granting device, then...I wish to be reunited with Penelope.
...Or, that's what I might have said, but unfortunately I'm a Heroic Spirit. I am not the same Odysseus who once lived in glory, and that also goes for Penelope.
That's why my wish would be to...
Hmmm...
Haha, I can't think of anything!

Master. How are you feeling?
Exhaustion is part of adventure.
Eat well and rest well.
That's also a part of your job...though saying such things makes me seem uptight.
But listen: try not to overdo it, okay?

I may have participated in the Trojan War, but Odysseus the hero's greatest ambition was simply to adventure.
Specifically, extremely difficult and dangerous ones.
I hear that the word "odyssey" means a long and often difficult journey in your time. Believe it or not, that term originates from my name, which means I'm your senior when it comes to adventuring.
So you may rely on me!

Everyone falls for me? Me!?
That's probably far from...
...Well, I guess it was true. But that was a long time ago.
Besides, that was when I finished fighting in the war and was trying to head back home to Penelope, so there was no way I was really aware women were falling for me...
I was too focused on my own desperation to get home.
And I also knew I hurt many because of it...
No, I'm just talking to myself now. Ignore me.

Come to think of it, there really wasn't much of a difference between war and my adventures.
I don't mean that they were both easy.
They were both tremendously difficult to overcome.
Like the impregnable Troy and the one-eyed giant cyclops... Both were the same to me: obstacles in my path to reuniting with my beloved Penelope.
I had no option but to push through all such hindrances. And I did.
That's all I can really say about that.
But to others, I guess my actions seemed somehow superhuman.
All I wanted to do was reach my loving wife, so I didn't really think I was doing anything special.

Master, is your journey to take back something precious...something that's near and dear to you that you've taken for granted, yet remains irreplaceable...?
I get it. I've taken the same path.
And so, I vow to you:
All of my magical energy...down to the very last fragment of a spiritron...will be dedicated to helping you move forward until the very end.
Don't forget that, Master.
Intelligence and perseverance. Rationality and determination.
Love and hope are all keys to victory!

The great hero Achilles!
If you're our ally now, there's no one more reliable!

Aias...that's a name I haven't heard in a while.
What? There's someone who can use that shield?

We both fought well.
Isn't that right, Hektor of the Shining Helmet?
Anyway, let's have a drink.
We both need a stiff drink.

Hm? HMMMM!?
Is that...Prince Paris!?
I see, so that's how the Heroic Spirits system works...
What? Apollo? How bothersome, I get it now.

Penthesilea, you are beautiful, as alwa—
Hm? What's that, Hektor? Don't ever say that word? What word?

Oh good.
I see that you can smile now, Circe.

Circe's...niece?
I do see a close resemblance. Very lovely.

Jason, my cousin.
Have you gotten more determined since we last met?

Charlotte Corday...
How can I repay that great debt I owe you?

A giant robot?
Oh, you're talking about my Noble Phantasm.
What? You want your Huge Bear unit to go up against mine?
...What are you talking about?

You want to try to dismantle my Noble Phantasm?
Ack, what are you talking about!?
For the love of science? What does it run on?
No, no, no! That's the product of the Achaean engineering the gods'―
Ahem!

Oh? A tactician from the East!
I see...how intriguing...!

Oh good.
I see that you can smile now, Circe.

W-we mustn't, Europa!
It's preposterous to even bring up the idea of having our two Noble Phantasms fight each other...!
Come again!?
You're asking because the young Heroic Spirits keep begging you to do so?
And you want to grant their wishes?
Oh, Europa...

Ah, Caenis!
How about a drink?
I have plenty I want to get off my chest about Poseidon...

Hm?
...Oh, it's you.
This is a shop. And for some reason I've been tasked with running it.
Shop...
Ah, it's not so bad, having a shop.
Maybe it's possible I could even have lived the life of a shopkeeper somewhere...

This is not your typical shop.
Neither currency nor gold are accepted here...
It's a shop that only performs a special kind of exchange.
Heh. Sounds shady?
There's no need to be suspicious.
My discerning eye can tell that many exquisite items are on offer here.
Look forward to it.

This is one of the best Craft Essences!
Now take it!
But it's not enough for you to just hold on to it. You need to equip it properly too.
This thing will definitely be of help to you in your travels.

Oh, it's you.
This time around, I was able to experience something I would not have been able to experience otherwise. I honestly feel that way.
...
To become a Heroic Spirit is to be the shadow of someone after their death.
It's almost the same as being some sort of remnant.
And though this is probably seldom mentioned...I want to leverage this experience to my next endeavor.
Do you think that's funny?

Well, this might be a good time to...
Oh, right.
You call this closing up shop.
If there's something you still need to exchange, you should do so right now.

White Day...hm, White Day.
I see. I do have some knowledge about it.
Well, you know...hmmm...I honestly don't know what I can do for you.
So tell me. Tell me what you want me to do and I will...
Hm, what's that?
I shouldn't say anything that might hint or suggest otherwise? Living in the modern world really is complicated...
But my offer won't change. Ask me anything. Tell me anything, and I'll grant your wish.

The compass.
I see it utilizes the polarized nature of the magnet.
It points your way on your journey.
How intriguing...

The compass that guides your way.
Having something like this would reassure you in your travels.
What about you?
What would you use as a guide on your adventures?

A journey without a destination is nice as well.
Traveling around the world freely, going wherever the wind and your heart take you...
That's another kind of adventure.
Though I personally like trips where I have both purpose and destination.

To properly use a compass, one must set a clear destination.
What will you find at the end of your travels?
Do you know what that will be?
What is it you are trying to reach?

Humans all take their own journeys.
Life is a journey in itself, aimlessly taking you where it will.
While humans are all destined to arrive at the same end to their journey in death,  they do not live simply to die.
Which means, humans journey purely for the act itself.
Someone told me something like that in the past...
Or at least I think there was someone...
Now, who was that...?

Your journey...or rather your life, is yours alone.
But you are in no way alone.
Throughout your long voyage, you are bound to meet comrades and companions.
And even if some may only be with you for a brief moment, the time spent together is sure to be a truly singular foundation for you.
Never forget that.
You are not alone.

So this is the final compass, huh?
Then here's your final reward.
I truly hope it will be of help to you.
No, I take that back.
It's a precious reward. You're going to make it useful, no matter what.
Use all the resources you acquired and move forward with everything you have!
For your journey...for your adventure!

True Name, Odysseus. I have manifested.
Allow me to be of help to you in your great adventure to save human history.
After all, I know the difficulty of advancing one step at a time.
Ha!
Sei!
Damn you!
Brigliadoro, let's go!

What I dislike...

That's always made me uneasy.
And...well...a long time ago, I did not like my face. Just a little bit.

A wish for the Holy Grail?

Do I still hate this face of mine?
No, I don't hate it.
It's just that I couldn't get used to it...
I was happy that sir hated my face.

Birthday? ...Yours? 
If you like pickles, I'll give you a barrel-full.
Or do you want me to recite a poem for you?
It's getting rowdy out there... We'll mobilize if it's a battle... So, how about it?
Quit dozing off! We're moving out. Hurry up and get ready. You want to get sliced up!?
Listen. Slicing people up takes courage. A sword is basically a tool that slices and stabs, and nothing else. Forget everything. Just move forward. Just slice.
You're the Master, and I'm the Servant. That's fine. But as long as the Shinsengumi is around, I will be me.

Hm? My favorite things?
...Let me think... Pickles.
Buy me a barrel-full.

What I hate...
Satsuma and Choushu, and that yellow-bellied shogunate retainer.
...Don't you give up.

Holy Grail?
I don't believe in far-fetched tales.
The only thing I believe in is the word "makoto."
What? You have business? If you don't, go and train.
You're starting to look like you've got resolve. You might come in handy running errands for me.
The past and the future have no meaning to me. Only right now matters. What about you?
Hmph. I see that you refuse to give up. But I don't mind stubborn folks like you.
I've wielded my sword for my sake. Not for anyone else. Only me. But as long as you don't give up, I will...the Shinsengumi...will always be there for you.
Okita...I'm going to tell you one thing: don't ever mimic her swordwork. It's not swordplay. It's something different.

That rowdy girl from the other day...or rather, the Demon King of the Sixth Heaven, was it? I like her methods...
But then again, she still pisses me off.
That brat. Don't let her near me. Looking at her just makes me mad.
So that's Musashi of the Niten Ichiryu...? You've got to be kidding me. Well...for you, let me reconsider. Niten Ichiryu...that's fine.
A queen of torture? Interesting. I'm pretty versed in that kind of torture myself. Want to compare notes? ...Hm, I see you're quite the beauty.
Oh, it's you. So, what are you going to pick? Hurry up and decide.
When I was young, I also peddled medicine...but I guess a job like this isn't for me.
Take it. It's fitting for the work you did.

Hey, are you sure that's really necessary?
Think carefully and choose.
Don't forget to report what you took. Raising funds without permission means...seppuku for you.
Shop's closed. Don't get so disappointed. Look at what's ahead. Our next battle is waiting for us...!
Hey, you hold on to it. Good. Next. We're gonna keep moving!
What? Is it something rare? Then you hold on to it. I'm not interested in it.
Oh, interesting... Bring it on! Come on!
Alright. The Shinsengumi will take that job.
So now we're heading over there. Quit dozing off and get a move on!
I'm Hijikata Toshizo, Vice Commander of the Shinsengumi. There's no need for re-introductions, but I'll at least go through the proper channels to work with you.
Hmph. I'll say you've done well thus far, but there's still work to be done. Don't just stand there, get to it!
This is the end? Absurd! No, this is just the beginning. Now you'll see what the Shinsengumi are truly capable of.
Hey, you're back. Don't forget to the briefing for today. ...What, you've got other things to do?
The Oda Bakufu is a joke. But no matter what the time period, what I do remains the same. I just slice and advance.
Today's military achievements...Ah, impressive. Fine. I'll treat you to a meal. Alcohol... Eh, guess you're too young for that.
Read up well on reports and the laws. I know it's cliché, but they do say: know thy enemy to know thyself.
...Hey, don't forget to report what you took. Raising funds without permission means...seppuku for you.
The battle here is over... But I...the Shinsengumi...will never end.
Hey, aren't those goods yours? Keep an eye on them.
This is the second time I'm leaving these headquarters. Hm? Doesn't matter to me. Wherever I am, that's where the Shinsengumi is.

Shinsengumi Vice Commander, Hijikata Toshizo.
My Class? That's irrelevant.
As long as I'm here, this...is...the Shinsengumi.
I'm Hijikata Toshizo. I'll be on your side for a bit. There's no need to brace yourself. As long as you follow the rules, I won't kill you.
Nyaa!
Waah!
You fool!
Special move... Chacha's explody flame blade!

[id 702600_0_G050]Now that you've thought it over a few...hundred times, [delay 3.6]you've realized that this outfit is perfect for Chacha? [id 702600_0_G051]Aww, you're such a great Master! [id 702600_0_G052]This proves that Chacha is the best in heaven and on earth!
What!? Master's birthday!? Then let's plant a cherry blossom tree! Set up a bathhouse AND a tea house! Chacha will plan the best flower viewing party for you!
Oh!? The air is quite festive! Chacha loves luxurious and exquisite events! Come on, hurry up and get ready, Master!
Chacha's bored! I don't care what it is, but let's do something fun! I'm bored, bored, BORED!
As the Sun's favorite, Chacha's obviously the super best...more than anyone else around! So do something interesting for me, please.
You are the Master, and Chacha's a Servant. That's true, but do...do you think Chacha's royal pedigree will allow such a... Eh? Auntie's a Servant too? Then everything's okay!
What I like? I like anything shiny that's luxurious and exquisite! Oh, and maybe sweet azuki bean soup!
What I don't like? That would obviously be the tanuki geezer! Argh! Just thinking about him now gets my blood boiling. I can NEVER forgive that Tokugawa!
Holy Grail? Well, it's kinda shiny and pretty... I guess it's good enough for Chacha. Maybe! It does look like it'd make a good ice cream dish!
Huh? It was Chacha's fault we lost at Osaka? That's not true! Chacha didn't do anything wrong! I-it was all His Highness's fault! His Hiiighness!
Let me warn you...never, ever mention the people who could have been saved. That's the one thing I have absolutely no patience for. I will not allow it, not even from Master's own lips.
Yep! Looks like Chacha and you are a good fit! Should we go for it? Should we restore Toyotomi? I wouldn't mind if it's even for the Azai or Oda!

I...I kept quiet this whole time, but...Ch-Chacha gets along well with you, Master, and we have the same taste in things, and fun stuff happens when I'm around you, and to be blunt, I really like you, Master, and... Eh? You knew!? O-oh no...!

My, my. You are an odd one. They say that everyone near me will be dragged down the path of destruction... Fine. Even though I may fear the flames that burn me forever, I will remain with you until you perish... I shall embrace you, my precious Master, to the very end...
Argh! That tanuki geezer's dog! What? He's not a tanuki, but he's called Lord Yoshinobu!? Who's that?
Auntie! Do something fun again today! Like...like performing "Atsumori" at the temple! That lame dance move you do...Chacha loves it!
Wha!? That scary-looking guy from before! I'm not gonna talk to him because he scares me! But poor guy...not getting to talk to Chacha!
Chacha died in flames, while you perished in darkness. And you speak a foreign language fluently... Are we maybe the same kind of Berserkers!?
Welcome to Chacha's shop! Now, get exchachanging! Get it? GET IT!?
Cha-cha-cha, cha-cha-cha, cha-cha-cha♪ Hm? Uh, well, this is...! Just finish up your shopping!
This thing? Oh-ho... You have fine taste!
There's still more! Chacha's treasures are the best in Japan! ...Well actually, they're His Highness's things.
If you need to buy some things, now's your Cha-chance! But I'm not giving any discounts!
There's a letter from Auntie. Hm. What does it say? "Yeeeah, if you could not forget Ascension materials so you're not stuck at a low level, that would be great..." What's this!?
Cha-cha! (Ta-da!) You just received an exquisite reward!
A...a rare item!? Chacha's totally weak to things like that! Show it to Chacha too!
Mission accomplished! Yet another page in Chacha's history book.
I sense a new quest beginning! Let's keep at it to become the daimyo of all daimyo! Well, actually, might as well be the ultimate world leader!
A hot new area's opened in the city!? W-we can't pass this by! Let's go look down our noses at everyone!
I see. So we've come this far. Now Chacha's body and soul are yours... I hope you can take care of me forever and ever.
Mission accomplished! By the way, don't you think Chacha speaks eloquently!? I feel like I'm such an international Sengoku girl!
You just completed all the quests! Even Chacha's super-duper grateful! The grand finale! It IS happily ever after!
How did today's battles go? Did anything fun happen? Huh? Huh? Huh?
You earn, and Chacha reaps the benefits. Aren't we like a married couple? N-no, no, don't get the wrong idea!
Use a Point, and score! Chacha's excited! The Restoration troops are nothing compared to us!
It'll be good to look through messages and information! If you do it half-baked, you might get set on FIRE! Like Auntie at the temple.

Hm. I'm getting bored! Chacha's heart is already set on the next event... Eh? You haven't gotten all the rewards yet? What are you waiting for!? If you don't try now, then when will you take over the world!? Come with Chacha right now!
They say even pleasures are merely the stuff of dreams... So our fun time together is almost at an end, but the real adventures with Chacha are just getting started!
Okay, let's collect today's Points... Eh? It's over? Wow, that was fast. Time flies when you're having fun. Don't leave anything behind, okay?
Um...this...and that... Oh, and this sparkly thing! Um, I don't need Auntie's junk... Oh, and you shouldn't forget any of your things either!

Yep, I've given up on my Class!

Don't get left behind in the event, Master.
Isn't it where all the strongest gather?

Serve your role as my traveling partner, Master.
Let's head out in search of powerful enemies we have yet to meet...and my one nemesis whom I will never forgive.
You are the Master of this queen. I expect you to demonstrate the appropriate strength and dignity for such a role.
The strong rule the weak. What other way could there be?

Things I like?
A true, earnest battle, training, capable subordinates, my sisters...
And powerful enemies I have yet to meet.

Heracles, Theseus, and Achilles...
Hmph. Heroes, heroes, and more heroes.
They are the reason for the fall of the nation of Amazons.
...Though I do admit they are powerful enemies.

My wish upon the Holy Grail could be only one thing. You should know very well what it is.
Once more... With that man...
And this time...!
I am a queen. You may be my Master, but you'll need to be mindful of your behavior. Those who show disrespect will pay a price most dear.

I see. So that is your strength... It is...something I do not possess.
How intriguing.

What I have is unflattering muscle and the stubborn pride of a queen.
Are you sure you want to invest so much in a Servant like me who is neither friendly nor interesting?
...You truly are a curious one.

I beg of you, do not see me as a woman. I am tired of being seen that way.
My once in a lifetime one-on-one combat against a renowned hero was interrupted by that treatment...
Do you now understand my resentment?

Tsk...you're such a fool.
But I have changed my way of thinking. If you can't help seeing me as a woman, and as beautiful...I just need my strength to eclipse both!
Brace yourself, Master! You will have a front row seat to witness my power...for eternity!
Heracles...! I will avenge my older sister, Hippolyta!

So that's Hektor of the Shining Helmet...
If only I had arrived earlier, I could have lent him my strength. We might have led Troy to victory. How regrettable…
Achilles! ACHILLEEES! Where the hell are you!? I'll kill you!
It matters not if our limbs are crushed or even ripped off. Amazons continue fighting. We have no use for healers. Then again... I suppose he did revive my nephew. I should thank him for that.

Prince Paris, is that you? I never thought I would be fighting alongside you once again. That former disgrace will be erased in battle. I vow that you will not see such an unsightly display ever again.

Odysseus is here!?
Yes, I know him.
I also know that it was not the sword or spear of a hero that ended the war, but some dirty scheme of his!
One of these days I'll have to teach him the proper ways of war!

Queen of the Amazons, Penthesilea. I have come in answer to your summons. 
...First let me say: should Achilles be here, bring him out. 
If you are hiding him from me, I will kill you.
Eat our innovation!
We're taking the initiative!
We'll be negotiating!
